item.title: 欧洲央行维勒鲁瓦称夏季前将利率降至 2% 是明智之举
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）说，欧洲中央银行应继续降息，争取在夏季达到 2%的利率水平，因为抗击通胀的斗争实际上已经取得了胜利。【原文：The European Central Bank should continue to cut interest rates to reach 2% by the summer as the battle against inflation is practically won, Governing Council member Francois Villeroy de Galhau said.】

item.title: 战争焦虑笼罩达沃斯专家，乌克兰和平仍遥遥无期
item.description: 尽管即将上任的美国总统唐纳德-特朗普誓言结束乌克兰的敌对状态，但战争仍是世界经济论坛调查的风险专家最担心的问题。【原文：War is the top worry wracking the nerves of risk experts surveyed by the World Economic Forum, despite incoming US President Donald Trump’s vow to end hostilities in Ukraine.】

item.title: 中国建筑商远洋在伦敦寻求债务计划批准
item.description: 违约的中国建筑商远洋集团控股有限公司（Sino-Ocean Group Holding Ltd.）周三将在伦敦一家法院举行为期三天的听证会，希望行使一项法律机制，允许债务人在未经债权人完全批准的情况下完成重组。【原文：Defaulted Chinese builder Sino-Ocean Group Holding Ltd. is entering a London court Wednesday for a three-day hearing, looking to exercise a legal mechanism allowing a debtor to potentially complete restructuring without creditors’ full approval.】

item.title: 印度贸易逆差在创下历史新高后于 12 月份有所缩小
item.description: 印度政府报告称，12 月份的贸易逆差低于预期，而上个月的贸易逆差扩大到创纪录的水平。【原文：The Indian government reported a lower-than-expected trade deficit for December, after the gap widened to a record in the previous month.】

item.title: 大选前德国国内生产总值连续第二年萎缩
item.description: 2024 年，德国经济连续第二年萎缩，2025 年也不太可能有大的增长，这暴露了德国新政府在二月份举行的临时选举中面临的挑战。【原文：Germany’s economy shrank for a second consecutive year in 2024 and is unlikely to grow much in 2025, laying bare the challenge for the country’s new government once snap elections are held in February.】

item.title: 国际能源署称美国禁止的油轮运输了五分之一的俄罗斯海运石油
item.description: 国际能源机构表示，美国最新的制裁措施有可能严重扰乱俄罗斯的能源出口，因为这些制裁措施把运输俄罗斯五分之一以上海运石油的油轮船队列入了黑名单。【原文：The latest US sanctions have the potential to significantly disrupt Russia’s energy exports as they blacklist a tanker fleet that moved more than a fifth of the nation’s seaborne oil flows, the International Energy Agency said.】

item.title: 越南力争到 2030 年完成核电站建设
item.description: 越南的目标是在 2030 年之前完成宁顺核电站的建设，因为越南正在加速实现其核能目标，并努力实现电力供应来源的多样化。【原文：Vietnam aims to complete construction of the Ninh Thuan nuclear power plant by 2030 as it ramps up its nuclear energy goals and seeks to diversify sources for power supply.】

item.title: 印度赶在制裁截止前为俄罗斯石油买单
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士说，印度的国有炼油企业正急于加快俄罗斯原油的付款速度，希望在华盛顿大幅扩大对莫斯科石油业的限制措施下月生效之前完成交易。【原文：India’s state refiners are rushing to speed up payments for Russian crude, hoping to complete their trades before a dramatic expansion of Washington’s curbs on Moscow’s oil industry effectively comes into force next month, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 金多斯称欧洲央行将在经济失去动力的情况下继续放宽政策
item.description: 欧洲央行副行长路易斯-德金多斯（Luis de Guindos）表示，随着该地区经济艰难增长，欧洲央行将继续降低利率。【原文：The European Central Bank will continue lowering interest rates as the region’s economy struggles to grow, according to Vice President Luis de Guindos.】

item.title: 印度为印度央行副行长面试学者和政府顾问
item.description: 印度政府本周开始面试新任央行副行长的候选人，这距离印度储备银行新行长的任命还不到一个月，距离关键的利率决定还有几周时间。【原文：India’s government began interviewing candidates for a new central bank deputy governor this week, less than a month after appointing a new head to the Reserve Bank of India and weeks before a crucial interest rate decision.】

item.title: 卢比下滑导致政策组合受限，促使印度央行放松控制
item.description: 印度储备银行开始放松对卢比的严格控制，承认同时实行固定汇率、开放资本账户和独立货币政策的困难。【原文：The Reserve Bank of India is starting to relent on its tight control of the rupee, acknowledging the difficulty of simultaneously having a fixed exchange rate, open capital account and an independent monetary policy.】

item.title: 合作伙伴集团 2024 年新承诺金额达 220 亿美元
item.description: 由于私人市场投资需求激增，Partners Group Holding AG 在 2024 年从客户那里获得了 220 亿美元的新资金。【原文：Partners Group Holding AG saw $22 billion in new money from clients in 2024 as demand for private market investments surged.】

item.title: 欧盟考虑退出俄罗斯液化天然气市场，欧洲天然气价格随之波动
item.description: 有报道称，作为新一轮制裁措施的一部分，欧盟正在考虑逐步淘汰俄罗斯的液化天然气，欧洲天然气价格因此出现波动。【原文：European natural gas prices fluctuated amid reports that the European Union is considering phasing out Russian LNG as part of a fresh package of sanctions.】

item.title: 象牙海岸为遏制可可走私解雇安全主管
item.description: 世界上最大的可可种植国象牙海岸在继续努力遏制可可走私的同时，解雇了两名军官和其他地方政府人员。【原文：Ivory Coast, the world’s biggest cocoa grower, dismissed two military officials and other local government personnel amid continuing efforts to curb smuggling of the crop.】

item.title: 法国预算部长表示政府的目标是节约 530 亿欧元
item.description: 法国预算部长阿梅利-德蒙沙林（Amelie de Montchalin）表示，作为缩小国家赤字计划的一部分，法国政府的目标是实现 530 亿欧元（546 亿美元）的节余。【原文：France’s government aims to achieve €53 billion ($54.6 billion) of savings as part of its plans to narrow the country’s deficit, according to Budget Minister Amelie de Montchalin.】

item.title: 美国制裁后俄罗斯原油堆积在中国海岸附近
item.description: 随着贸易商、炼油商和船运公司试图避免陷入美国对俄罗斯能源流动实施的史上最严厉制裁，中国沿海滞留的石油数量不断增加。【原文：The amount of oil stranded off the Chinese coast is growing as traders, refiners and shipping companies try to avoid being caught up in the US’s strictest-ever sanctions on Russian energy flows.】

item.title: 工艺品零售商 Joann 一年内第二次申请破产
item.description: 由于销售额持续下滑，工艺品和织物零售商 Joann Inc.【原文：Crafts and fabric retailer Joann Inc. has filed bankruptcy for the second time in less than a year, as its sales continue to decline.】

item.title: Currys 恢复股息，成本控制改善前景
item.description: Currys Plc 预计今年将实现更高的利润，并恢复分红，因为它严格控制了成本。【原文：Currys Plc expects a higher profit this year and reinstated a dividend, as it kept a tight lid on costs.】

item.title: 印尼降息出乎市场意料；印尼盾下滑
item.description: 印尼一反市场预期，下调了关键利率，即使在本币近期跌破1美元兑换16,000印尼盾的关键水平后，仍采取了促进经济增长的举措。【原文：Indonesia defied market expectations by cutting its key interest rate, moving to bolster economic growth even after the local currency’s recent slide beyond the key level of 16,000 to the dollar.】

item.title: 活动人士敦促日本富士媒体调查歌星丑闻
item.description: 一位激进投资者要求日本富士媒体控股公司（Fuji Media Holdings Inc.【原文：An activist investor is demanding that Japan’s Fuji Media Holdings Inc. investigate a scandal embroiling one of the country’s most prominent celebrities, saying lack of transparency over the issue could erode shareholder value.】

item.title: 英国通胀放缓为降息敞开大门，英镑下跌
item.description: 数据显示英国 12 月通胀率意外下降，缓解了人们对持续物价压力的担忧，并可能为英国央行进一步降息打开大门，英镑随之下跌。【原文：The pound fell after data showed UK inflation fell unexpectedly in December, easing fears over persistent price pressures and potentially opening the door to further Bank of England interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 英国通胀意外放缓提振降息希望
item.description: 英国 12 月份的通胀率出人意料地出现了三个月来的首次回落，使英国央行下月降息的希望得以延续。【原文：UK inflation unexpectedly slipped back for the first time in three months in December, keeping alive hopes of a Bank of England interest-rate cut next month.】

item.title: 拜耳因半个世纪前的毒害事件面临数十亿美元赔偿
item.description: 拜耳公司（Bayer AG）旗下的孟山都公司（Monsanto）早在半个世纪前就停止生产有毒的多氯联苯，但即使美国的家庭、学校和工厂不再使用许多使用这种化学品制造的建筑材料，其法律后果仍然挥之不去。【原文：Bayer AG’s Monsanto unit stopped making toxic PCBs a half century ago, but the legal fallout lingers even as many of the building materials made with the chemicals are no longer used in US homes, schools and factories.】

腾讯与吉列莫特家族被指酝酿育碧资产合资事宜
item.description: 据知情人士透露，腾讯控股有限公司（Tencent Holdings Ltd.）和育碧娱乐公司（Ubisoft Entertainment SA）的创始人吉列莫特（Guillemot）家族正在考虑成立一家新的合资企业，其中将包括育碧的某些资产，以提升这家法国视频游戏公司的价值。【原文：Tencent Holdings Ltd. and Ubisoft Entertainment SA’s founding Guillemot family are considering creating a new venture that would include certain Ubisoft assets as they seek to boost the French video-game company’s value, people familiar with the situation said.】

item.title: 中国各地区在 "国家指南 "中设定 2025 年增长目标
item.description: 中国五个最重要的省份表示，它们计划今年的经济增长率达到或超过 5%，这表明，尽管贸易逆风日益加剧，中国仍将制定雄心勃勃的国家目标。【原文：Five of China’s most important provinces said they plan to grow at or above 5% this year, signs that the country will set an ambitious national target despite growing trade headwinds.】

item.title: 太空探索技术公司 "猎鹰9号 "发射两个探测器，登月竞赛白热化
item.description: 太空探索公司（SpaceX）发射了两颗携带月球车的商业卫星，私营部门在月球竞赛中的竞争愈演愈烈。【原文：SpaceX launched a pair of commercial satellites carrying lunar rovers as competition intensifies in the private sector’s race to the moon.】

item.title: SGS 与必维就 330 亿美元的合并进行谈判
item.description: SGS SA 正在与必维国际检验集团（Bureau Veritas SA）商谈合并事宜，合并后的欧洲测试和认证公司市值将超过 330 亿美元。【原文：SGS SA is in talks to combine with Bureau Veritas SA in a deal that would create a European testing and certification company with a combined market value of more than $33 billion.】
